column6: Heritage and Values of the United States Air Force II
column7: Heritage and Values of the United States Air Force is a survey course designed to introduce students to the United States Air Force and provides an overview of the basic characteristics, missions, and organization of the Air Force. Prerequisite: AFAS 111 or consent of instructor. Concurrent enrollment in AFAS 102 is required.
column9: Prerequisite: AFAS 111 or consent of instructor. Concurrent enrollment in AFAS 102 is required.
